website_summaries.verdict: This high calorie liquid food supplement works well for finicky eaters and dogs that need to gain weight.
pros: Can be used alone, or mixed with dry kibble
Provides additional calories for puppies, pregnant dogs and post-surgical patients
Uses real vanilla flavoring for added appeal
Addresses dehydration issues when mixed with water
cons: Not always effective for weight gain
Sweet vanilla fragrance may not appeal to some dogs

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but crappy packaging for shipment.
customer_reviews.text: MY Dogs love this stuff, I am a Breeder for shipment of Great Danes and I even give this to my litters mixed with their food they too love this. the ONLY problem I have is the way they package it when I got my last shipment the lid was broke on one of the Gallon jugs and the product was all over and plus I was not too happy with the waste of the product that I paid for. I hope they can find a better way of shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is old and sick with cancer. He won't eat and starving himself to death, literally. This has helped getting him eating again and has put a little bit of flesh back onto his bones. I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Mom-of-QT's

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement to help bring animals to a healthier weight.
customer_reviews.text: I have a female great dane, Luna, who is more active than the typical dane. She struggles to gain weight, even with high calorie kibble, so I bought this to help give her a little extra padding. It really does work too! Luna absolutely goes crazy for this stuff. It smells like vanilla (from the milk proteins I believe) which is better than a lot of the nastier smelling foods. I don't follow the directions because I don't have the patience to measure out this viscous liquid. Instead I just drizzle a bit over her food. Be careful though because Luna vomited from eating her food too fast, even with a slow feeder.
customer_reviews.author: doubleplusungood

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective.
customer_reviews.text: This supplement was recommended by my vet. One of my dogs (a Belgian Malinois mix) is a very finicky eater, eating every other day. After giving her this for about 3 days, she pulled a 180°: she now eats her full meal every day (twice per day if you give her!).
customer_reviews.author: Kevon Thomas

customer_reviews.title: 18 months old
customer_reviews.text: My underweight pound pup loves this stuff! Gallon is only 1/2 finished... and she has already gained 10 pounds! She looks so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M.

customer_reviews.title: Great to help gain weight
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to help our dog who has cancer keep some weight on while being treated. It works wonderfully! If you follow the directions and just add a little and gradually move them up it doesnt make her have the runs! Best product for our girl♡
customer_reviews.author: TStark

customer_reviews.title: Adds weight and tasty for dog,,,be aware it is harmful to cats
customer_reviews.text: We poured it into a ketchup bottle to squeeze out easily on the puppy food. I am going to try a gallon pump also to see if it will work. Please make sure your cat cannot lick this as it contains propylene glycol, dangerous to cats. The label mentions to not give to cats but many people do not read the fine print. This really helped put weight on our grrowing puppy.
customer_reviews.author: ghettozoo

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonders for my pup. He was 6 mos when I got him and was previously feral so he was drastically underweight. Added it to his food every day and he put on healthy weight. He's a strapping 70lbs now 6 months later compared to the 27lbs when I got him. I still use it in smaller amounts on both my dogs food because it helps keep their coat healthy and shiny and skin healthy especially in the crappy New England winters.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Fell in love
customer_reviews.text: Helped my dog who recently gave birth put on weight in no time. I mixed this with her dry food and she loves it. Sometimes I even add a can of wet dog food and she really goes crazy
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Dogs LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: It delivers extra calories to help maintain weight while weaning puppies. It is excelent for mixing with parasite control agents. Puppies lap it up! I send a bit home with each puppy to help in the transitioning to their new surroundings and schedules. It works great for that. Also aids in enticing picky dogs to eat their meals.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela  L H

customer_reviews.title: This is rocket fuel for sick dogs!
customer_reviews.text: In our dog rescue, we use Dyne a lot. Dogs love it and it helps sick & emaciated dogs get up and eating! This is awesome for mama dogs but it makes the puppies bigger! Use on experienced mamas, not 1st time mama dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: My dogs loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My husky loved it. Heck I thought it smelled great. Smells like vanilla yogurt or ice cream. Even the other dogs who didn’t need it ended up chewing up the bottle and we had to salvage what we could out of it. My husky for whatever reason looses weight like crazy in the winter so we tried this. He put on just the right amount of weight and it lasted the rest of winter. Will definitely use this again if it looks like he’s losing weight again.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer
customer_reviews.text: Wow does this actually help. I am a believer now. Brent old to try this for a while but hesitated because these things usually don't work out for me. But this has made a huge difference in my Doberman. She is finally getting her weight back up after a foot injury left her immobile for a bit. Her energy is up and she is gaining weight. Her coat looks great and shines.
customer_reviews.author: Kalee Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: My husband's new hunting puppy was extremely active and just seemed to be too skinny. By adding this supplement to his morning meal, we quickly noticed that he began to look less guant and his coat became shiny. It may not be necessary to give this to your average pup but for a very active hunter, it was a great solution. (Just giving more dog food isn't the answer).
customer_reviews.author: Dog mother

customer_reviews.title: I DIDN'T SEE ANY CHANGE IN MY DOGS WEIGHT
customer_reviews.text: If you have a dog and you love that dog then you will be able to notice when they lose weight. My dogs started to lose weight so my EX-VET suggested this MESS. I used it and NOTHING!!! I HAVE A NEW VET AND I MADE HER PAY FOR THE BOTTLE. I TOLD HER I DON'T HAVE MONEY TO WASTE AND SHE PROMISED IT WOULD WORK. What really worked it that I switched their food and the number of times I feed them in a day. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY...
customer_reviews.author: Ummhumm

customer_reviews.title: Good dog nutritional supplement!
customer_reviews.text: Fatten up your dogs and puppies with this! Obviously, you need to make sure you are feeding a proper diet in the first place as this is just a supplement to your dog food/raw diet.
customer_reviews.author: Imburne

customer_reviews.title: Alright supplement BUYER BE ADVISED (hold)
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying the dyne high calorie supplement from amazon BUYER BEWARE! For some it may be normal but they will put a hold on your account until delivery I have 64.00 plus extra dollars taken out of my account at 4 am..though they explained I still found this to be extremely weird plus the product did not give my dogs the usual robustness that I see when I order this product from chewy.com I chose amazon for the shipping options 🤷🏽‍♀️That’s it that’s all
customer_reviews.author: Arianne elizabeth Rose

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this initially for my Great Dane puppy and he loves it. However so does the rest of my dogs lol. They love it mixed in with their food with a little water. I have bought this a few times now and will continue to do so for my large breed dogs. Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan 1978

customer_reviews.title: May cause yeast infection
customer_reviews.text: Be careful if your dog is yeast sensitive. This gave my pittie a terrible skin yeast infection
customer_reviews.author: kelly detwiler

customer_reviews.title: Great product for sheep
customer_reviews.text: We use dyne on our show lambs throughout the year. Excellent supplement and we have had great results raising healthy lambs. Incorporate into your feeding program and you will be pleased with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Godwin

customer_reviews.title: No need to put the cap on
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today in a trash bag. Post office informed me it had leaked all over and had gotten on other people's stuff and needed to know if what was in it was hazardous or not. Open the box to show her the contents and the cap was off of the product. Guess they don't value their customers more than the 5 cents worth of tape it would of took to secure the cap. Destroyed the items in my order as well.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Martin

customer_reviews.title: Order two gallons of Dyne. One of them exploded ...
customer_reviews.text: Order two gallons of Dyne. One of them exploded. Package inside had very little protection for the products and it had no FRAGILE sign. It left a huge mess and the other packages were damaged with the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Hard to say
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for almost a year and she likes the taste but has only gained 1 pound. My vet says I should celebrate that pound because she lost so much for so long but idk an entire year 1 pound doesn't Sean much
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: My dog is addicted!
customer_reviews.text: I have to hide the container as my dogs like it too much! Ive caught them several times trying to steal the bottle and chew it. Did its job for a lactating female I had. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great getting weight on dogs
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our English Mastiff. She was so thin and just wasn’t interested in eating. Since we started using this on her food 6 months ago she has gained 30 pounds and looks so much healthier!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Aime

customer_reviews.title: Not for older dogs
customer_reviews.text: Came quick and my dogs liked it. A week later my oldest Rottie (10 years) got sick and died. He developed diarrhea and past away. I stopped using. His daughter (9 years) was sick first, but she got better. My youngest at 1and 1/2 never got sick.
customer_reviews.author: CedricTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for pups, new Moms or ailing pets
customer_reviews.text: I use dyne with ground up dry dog food and water for my pups to start the weaning process and I use it to supplement the Moms caloric intake without stretching out their stomach by feeding huge amounts of food
customer_reviews.author: Melody Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I run a rescue and this supplement has been a lifesaver. LITERALLY. I am currently treating a 3.8lb puppy with pneumonia. I think this product is helping her stay alive. I don't know how else I would be able to get this many calories into a puppy that refuses to eat and drink. I am so happy I found this product. I really believe its helped save many dog lives.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Canine Connection

customer_reviews.title: Good for senior hard keepers
customer_reviews.text: I have an older dog who is not holding his weight as well as he used to. Just 2 weeks on this & I noticed a difference in his weight gain, a brighter eye, & a pep in his step. He will be on this the remaining time of his life.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: My litters LOVE this and gain weight quickly! So pleased with my purchase! Older dogs love the taste as well and will eat their food so much better when this is added!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seen improvement!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs needed more vitamins in their diet and since using I can see an improvement in their coat and weight. They look healthier and have more energy. Will be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Found a mouse in it
customer_reviews.text: My dog wouldn’t eat this when I bought it a bit ago. Today I started cleaning out our cabinets and started pouring this out and there was a chunk in there... IT WAS A MOUSE!!! The lid has been tightly on and nothing has chewed in it so this had to have happened during manufacturing. So disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great supplement for dogs and a great tasty one as well. My dogs love it like it’s pudding or candy. Little do they know it’s good for them. Highly recommended for puppies and nursing mothers.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs love it. 12 years old pit had started loosing weight but now pick weight back up. My year and a half bully is thick and solid. Since last purchased in October 19, price have gone up by $20. I understand cost and demands but really?
customer_reviews.author: WMV TRAVELS

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love It
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how the dogs loved it. Hope it provides the nutrients I bought it for. Time will tell :)
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Pups love this! So do I as a breeder.
customer_reviews.text: Pups love this!!! Builds strong healthy pups. Shipping not always the greatest and spills some. And very expensive to be wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Tamm Bamm

customer_reviews.title: Really helps my dog keep weight on!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a special needs dog. She has ME, which makes it difficult for her to keep food down. This has really helped her to keep weight on and it gives her the extra nutrients she needs. The only problem is that Amazon has raised the price 35% in the past year!!
customer_reviews.author: victoria lee artel

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved
customer_reviews.text: My nursing dog needed extra calories.. she loved the taste and it worked well
customer_reviews.author: The Awesome Pawsome

customer_reviews.title: Price was great and Dogs love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought three bottles of this for my Danes. The price was great as they were cheaper than anywhere else!!! I absolutely loved the price and my Danes love the flavor!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sorry packing
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this multiple times and more than once the item arrives with the jug destroyed and the box is completely soaked with the Dyne. The post office has to leave it at my home in one of their plastic bins and it is a sorry, sticky mess. Then I have to repack all the sticky mess up and return it! This product is good for our working dogs but do yourself a favor and buy elsewhere. When I buy elsewhere this packing problem never happens.
customer_reviews.author: kim carroll

customer_reviews.title: Good product but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was smashed during shipping causing it to leak. I lost quite a bit of the product. I ordered dyne before, I love the product. My dogs love it and i can feed them less food without significant weight loss.
customer_reviews.author: kristopher q.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my puppies and have definitely noticed a difference and helped with healthy weight gain and they seem to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I can tell that this product works, it gives my dogs energy and also helps with them gaining weight/muscle. But my dogs do not like this product everytime on their food, it usually ends up wasting the food because my dogs will not touch it after I put it on their food.
customer_reviews.author: Colton LeClaire

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: So far my oldest dog loves it. My pup wasn’t able to sustain the Supplement down, but he’s more sensitive to foods.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Scott

customer_reviews.title: No brainer
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves this product, and it helps keep his weight up. Would recommend for anyone having problems w their dogs weight. Like everything you just have to give it time to work. It will not work right away, remember that.
customer_reviews.author: vic

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs and they all love the flavor. Not long after I started giving them Dune there was a quick noticeable change in quality of their coats and energy as well as some much needed weight gain to my 2 LGD's. They're so active it was hard to keep weight on them. I highly recommend and will continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: Mildred

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. This is my first time buying the gallon one and it makes sense monetary wise. Will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Maybe too late
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product for my dog, it did not help him at all. I dont know if he was too sick before I found this product, but he died within a week of me receiving this. I was so hoping it would help. Very sad about losing him.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a picky pup who was a little too skinny. Since starting her on this she has reached and maintained a healthy weight. She likes the flavor and has not tired of it. This product greatly improved our dogs quality of life.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Netzer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love the flavor. They savor all there food with it. Great nutrients for them..
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Ivette Torres

customer_reviews.title: Amazon has the best price I could find on this
customer_reviews.text: Product works well to maintain pups and dogs weight . Amazon has the best price I could find on this ..
customer_reviews.author: Polo Esparza

customer_reviews.title: 😘
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff you can see your dog get thicker after he/she eats
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It works but my dog for some reason doesn’t like it
customer_reviews.author: Andy Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Long time user
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for pups under 8 months. American Bully, American Pitbull, frenchy, bull breeds in general. Great for the Malnourished.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: My English bulldog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I been mixing this with hes food and he its it all right away! Though it does make him poop right away!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: With this new purchase the Dyne color is lighter than before and my dog doesn't seem to enjoy as before
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this product before and had nothing negative to say about it. With this new purchase the Dyne color is lighter than before and my dog doesn't seem to enjoy as before.
customer_reviews.author: J_Elfuerte

customer_reviews.title: Dyne
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for years. Dogs love it and helps put weight on puppies and picky eaters. I was iffy bout ordering thru Amazon thinking it might not be legit. But hey....i thought wrong. Nicely packaged and now it comes sealed so it wont leak when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher lee

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Here at Jeffco Kennels we used Dynes. We drizzle over their hard food and they will eat every drop. They love this stuff and it's good for them. Also if I have a puppy that is having sugar drops I use this or if I have a pup or cat that needs fattened. It looks like condense milk and the pups love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Michel

customer_reviews.title: Feed the supplement along with regular dog food.
customer_reviews.text: This supplement allowed my dog to regain the lost weight, 10 lbs to 34 lbs. His last year of life was the quality he had as a young dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really helps
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my one female dog that had pups and was not putting weight back on so easily, and it’s helping her put it back on faster and I’m really glad I got this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: For dogs who dont enjoy peanutbutter flavors.
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love the sweet vanilla taste much better than regular wet dog food.
customer_reviews.author: devin

customer_reviews.title: Best out there to help your animals
customer_reviews.text: Best other there to help ur animal get back to were it needs to be.
customer_reviews.author: Milton E.

customer_reviews.title: most dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: This a great product to add weight to a dog. I did note that most,but not all,dogs like it

customer_reviews.title: My Dogos Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Dogo Argentinos love this stuff. Makes them eat more.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Great
customer_reviews.text: My dog wasn't eating so i bought this and he seems to really like it. He gets excited whenever I bring out the jug.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent supplement
customer_reviews.text: My Exotic American bullies love and and it makes them so healthy in weight and vibrant.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: have used this product for years, great for all animals, pets love it, my dogs look and feel great

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!

customer_reviews.text: makes your dog eat more makes them have better appetite to eat there dog kibbles makes me save money for not buying ground meat when puppies or dogs dont wanna eat this makes them eat everyhting

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. We had a litter of bulldogs that needed a little extra help they love the taste and made feeding time so much easier. I would definitely buy again.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this!
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered this so many times. Our dogs simply love it!

customer_reviews.text: The cap was not securely on...about 1/4 of this expensive stuff was missing.. not to happy. .

customer_reviews.title: Helps grow dogs body mass
customer_reviews.text: This helped my thin sharpei pick up a little mass. Good product.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this they lost appetite and this brought it back plus gaining weight good product

customer_reviews.title: Saved our dog!
customer_reviews.text: We had a dog recovering from an illness, skin and bones. No appetite like she gave up. Started her on Dyne in a week she looked better, appetite back and personality again. Thank you Dyne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and price
customer_reviews.text: Great product and price. Much better then any local prices.

customer_reviews.title: Purchase It Now

customer_reviews.title: Great

product_meta.title: Dyne High Calorie/Weight Gainer Dog Supplement
product_meta.description: Dyne(r) high calorie liquid nutritional supplement for dogs & Puppies Dyne for Dogs provides a highly palatable source of vitamins and minerals for the health of your animal. It helps undernourished animals gain weight, encourages faster recovery from illness or malnutrition due to parasites, and improves appetite. Features: high in fat to aid dogs recovering from illness highly palatable with pleasant vanilla flavor to encourage finicky eaters enhanced with added vitamins for proper nutrient utilization delivers critical nutrition to nursing mothers helps improve coat luster and skin content helps animals recover from travel stress item specifications: sizes: 16 oz. 32 oz. Gallon guaranteed analysis per fl oz.: Crude protein (min.): 1.9% Crude Fat (min.): 48.3% Crude Fiber (max.): 0.5% Moisture (max.): 18.0% Vitamin A (Min.): 1790 IU vitamin D (min.): 186 IU vitamin C (min.): 175 IU thiamin (min.): 0.18mg riboflavin (min.): 0.25mg Niacin (min.): 0.18mg vitamin B6 (min.): 0.08mg folic acid (min.): 0.04mg vitamin B12 (min.): 0.71mcg vitamin E, (min.): 4.5 IU calorie Content (Me): 5, 285 kcal/kg, 29.1 kcal/tsp (5ml) ingredients: soybean Oil, sugar, water, glycerin, dried skimmed milk, Polysorbate 80, dried Egg whites, propylene glycol, artificial vanilla flavor, pectin citrus, gum Arabic, ascorbic acid (preservative) sodium benzoate (preservative), vitamin E supplement, vitamin A supplement, niacin Supplement, Calcium Pantothenate, riboflavin Supplement, fd&c Yellow #5, pyridoxine hydrochloride, Thiamine hydrochloride, Folic Acid, Vitamin D3 Supplement, vitamin B12 supplement Directions for feeding: shake well. May be fed directly or poured over food. Clean, free-choice water should be available at all times. Weaned puppies: 1/4 tsp per lb.
